verses.name: 2 Samuel 3:5
verses.text: And the sixth, Ithream, by Eglah David’s wife. These were born to David in Hebron.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 3:6
verses.text: And it came to pass, while there was war between the house of Saul and the house of David, that Abner made himself strong for the house of Saul.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 3:7
verses.text: And Saul had a concubine, whose name was Rizpah, the daughter of Aiah: and Ish–bosheth said to Abner, Wherefore hast thou gone in unto my father’s concubine?
